item.title: You Were Never Really Here
item.description: Thoughts Warning: Massive Spoilers to Follow You Were Never Really Here is the best meditation on Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder that I have seen at the movies. Unlike most movies that deal with Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder is never mentioned. It’s not even alluded to. You Were Never Really Here doesn’t have a lot to say about Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder, but that’s because the movie makes the viewer feel the symtpoms of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder.
